title: 无法收到mojang发送的修改密码邮件
author: 粉碎英雄
txt_content:
谷歌验证可以使用，客服求助后只给我发了封帮助邮件(无用)，试了好几天并且用不同浏览器访问依然无效。 
      因vpn更换节点原因最近改了多次密码，然后就不能改了

replies.author: 皮皮懒不懒
replies.txt_content:
粉碎英雄 发表于 2020-4-1 11:15
另外你也是疫情期间这样情况的吗？
不是，我这个号丢很久了，快一年了，另外论坛不是聊天的地方，我们会被警告灌水的，如果真的需要问我相关问题，给我私信，如果满意我的回答，请给最佳

replies.author: 粉碎英雄
replies.txt_content: 不知道是疫情原因还是我的账号被锁定了？

replies.author: PercyDan
replies.txt_content: 账号暴毙

replies.author: 皮皮懒不懒
replies.txt_content: 估计账号炸了，我一个其中一个正版就暴毙了，收不到邮件，密码一致错误，发送邮件申诉也不给通过（带订单号）

replies.author: 雨韵
replies.txt_content: 我前段时间也出现了这个问题，和你有点区别就是我能改密码，但是不管怎么改都是错误密码。后来更换了另一个VPN后就可以了

replies.author: 皮皮懒不懒
replies.txt_content:
粉碎英雄 发表于 2020-4-1 10:56
那怎么解决啊
给mojang发邮件，一般回复时间是14天+，我发了4次时隔3个多月，最后我选择了新买个账号

replies.author: 粉碎英雄
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 皮皮懒不懒
replies.txt_content:
粉碎英雄 发表于 2020-4-1 11:02
前几天给mojang和mojanghelp都发了，没回复
回复要很久，两周起步，慢慢等吧

replies.author: 粉碎英雄
replies.txt_content:
皮皮懒不懒 发表于 2020-4-1 11:03
回复要很久，两周起步，慢慢等吧
回复内容我写的收不到改密邮件没问题吧

replies.author: 皮皮懒不懒
replies.txt_content:
粉碎英雄 发表于 2020-4-1 11:05
回复内容我写的收不到改密邮件没问题吧
我以前也这么写的，这是他回复的原文Hi,

Sorry to hear about the trouble with your account. We also apologize for the delayed response as we're currently dealing with a large backlog.

If you have access to your email, a Mojang account password can be reset from https://account.mojang.com/password. Be sure to check your spam folder/other folders if the email is not showing up. Additionally, try resetting it using a different browser or device. If you have an old Minecraft account (you log into the game with your username), you can reset your password and migrate your account at https://account.mojang.com/migrate.

If you have reset your password and are still unable to login, then the problem you've described sounds like a temporary issue. Please wait 30 minutes before logging in again, do not attempt to log in to any of our services. When you log in, make sure that there are no typos.

If you continue to have trouble accessing your account after 30 minutes, more information can be found at; https://help.mojang.com/customer/en/portal/articles/781529.

If you do not have access to your email, we can change your email address so that you can reset your password in the future, but we will first need to verify account ownership. Please provide your transaction ID or gift code from when the account was purchased. For information on how to locate your transaction ID, or recover it if you no longer have it, please see http://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/articles/361380.

We recommend checking for the transaction ID for all possible email addresses you may have used on the account or at the time of purchase.

If you have already provided us with the transaction ID, please just let me know by replying to this email and we'll take it from there.

Again, we apologize for the delayed response time and if you have any further questions or concerns, please just let me know.

Best regards,
Rui R
Mojang Support
